issue.title: [C++] Implements basic Dataset/Scanner/ScannerBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6242](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6242). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The goal of this would be to iterate over a Dataset and generate a "flattened" stream of RecordBatches from the union of data sources and data fragments. This should not bother with filtering yet.
